pages.text: Puff Bugs are tiny neutral creatures that can be found in the Poise Forests of the End.$(br2)They will be around until they find an unpollinated Bolloom Bud, then, they will polizate them and obtain the Levitation Effect for a few minutes.$(br2)After that, if you give a Balloom Fruit to them, they will drop a Baloom Bud.
Puff Bugs can be breed, you only have to give them Tall Poise Bush.
